item.title: Talking to outside world from Elixir
item.description:
I gave a talk recently at ElxirKenya about how to communicate with the outside world from elixir.
The ecosystem for talking to the outside world from beam systems has a lot of options.
Beyond the ports,nifs,interfaces,distributed erlang i found a new language ziglang.
ziglang was interesting not only for creating nifs
but also as a possible future replacement for writing simple,fast,safe code
This is the talk as well as a video about why to use zig to write nifs
enjoy !!

  • Talking to the outside world talk

  • Zigler: Elixir FFIs with Zig - Isaac Yonemoto
